Astrum Solar <http://www.solar4worcester.com>
A Message from Our Partner Program
Talk to Customers. Make Money.
Become an Astrum Solar partner.
<http://www.astrumsolar.com/company/partner-programs>
Make Money By Talking to Your Customers About Solar
Solar installations are skyrocketing with more solar installations in the US over the last 18 months than in the past 30 years. With no investment on your part, why not profit from that growth by becoming an Astrum Solar partner?
All you have to do is something you are already doing—talk to your customers in Massachusetts. For every Massachusetts home owner you refer to us that completes a site survey, you get paid, and your cash bonus is even higher if they become one of our customers. You’ll earn $100/Qualified Lead* and $750/Sale!
As a partner with Astrum Solar, you will be working with one of the top ten solar installers in the US who has been recognized as one of the fastest growing companies by Inc. Magazine and has an A rating from the BBB. By helping your customers go solar, you help them save money, increase their home value, become more energy independent and contribute to a cleaner planet. These are benefits all of your customers will appreciate. In addition to these benefits, they’ll receive a $1,000 discount through September 30!**
Questions?
Email us at partners.astrumsolar.com <mailto:partners@astrumsolar.com>
Interested? Become a partner today! <http://www.astrumsolar.com/company/partner-programs>
Special Event on August 26 7:00 PM – 8:00 PM Courtyard Worcester | 72 Grove Street | Worcester, MA 01605
Astrum Solar will be hosting a free Solar Seminar on August 26 for all Massachusetts residents, families, and friends! Join us for a short presentation and learn about the money-saving and environmental benefits of going solar with Astrum. Refreshments will be served.
An expert will be on hand to answer any questions about what’s involved in going solar and to assess solar potential and electricity savings for Massachusetts residents. This is a great opportunity to learn how you can earn money by spreading the benefits of going solar to your customers.
Reserve your spot today! <http://solarforworcester.eventbrite.com>
See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way Call Us: 800-903-6130 ext. 825
You are receiving this email because you could benefit from the Astrum Solar Partner Program.
*A qualified lead is when the referral prospect agrees to a roof evaluation (i.e. site survey) by Astrum Solar.
**LIMITED TIME OFFER: Valid for qualifying homes that sign a new solar system contract with Astrum Solar by September 30, 2014. In lieu of a cash rebate, customers can opt to use the $1,000 as a down payment to reduce their monthly solar fees or to receive a $1,000 discount off the contract price at the time of their purchase. Otherwise, $1,000 cash back rebate to be mailed approximately 30 days after the system is installed. Minimum system size is 5 kW. Qualifying homes must be located in a territory that Astrum Solar serves. Offer is in addition to other available promotions or discounts.
A solar power system is customized for your home, so pricing, savings, utility bill and solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. Financing terms vary by location and are not available in all areas. MA 16822
